channel.title: Lock Chat's Etc
channel.description:
I'd like to see lockable chat's
If their all on Off, when you check later they have different status as Hide, Friends, Friends It would be usefull if they will stay off when your back after, so you wont get stuff like when someone added you and asks stuff and you dont reply

item.title: Lock Chat's Etc
item.dc:creator: @ShadowZ ShadowZ
item.description:
@ShadowZ wrote:

I’d like to see lockable chat’s

If their all on Off, when you check later they have different status as Hide, Friends, Friends
It would be usefull if they will stay off when your back after, so you wont get stuff like when someone added you and asks stuff and you dont reply
